definition: Anterior pituitary peptide from POMC that stimulates the adrenal cortex (zona fasciculata/reticularis) to make cortisol (and adrenal androgens).
why_it_matters: Key switch in hypercortisolism work‑ups (pituitary vs ectopic) and in adrenal insufficiency. Also explains steroid‑induced adrenal suppression.
how_youll_see_it: Diurnal: high in early morning, low at night
problem_solving: If adrenal insufficiency suspected → 8am cortisol ± ACTH stim test
Hypercortisolism: start with overnight dexamethasone suppression
If cortisol not suppressed → measure ACTH; then high‑dose dex or inferior petrosal sinus sampling if needed

differentials.name: Cushing disease
differentials.hint: pituitary ACTH ↑; partial suppression with high‑dose dex

differentials.name: Ectopic ACTH
differentials.hint: no suppression with dex; very high ACTH

tricks: Exogenous steroids suppress ACTH → adrenal atrophy
Check meds that alter cortisol assays (e.g., OCPs) before interpreting
exam_appearance: Smoker with weight loss + severe hypokalemia; no suppression with high‑dose dex → ectopic ACTH
Long‑term prednisone stopped abruptly → low ACTH & cortisol
treatment: Treat the cause: pituitary surgery for Cushing disease; tumor management for ectopic ACTH
Secondary adrenal insufficiency: physiologic glucocorticoid replacement; stress‑dose when ill
red_flags: Adrenal crisis: hypotension, hyponatremia, shock after stress/illness—give stress‑dose steroids immediately
algorithm: Suspect cortisol disorder → screen (overnight 1 mg dexamethasone OR late‑night salivary cortisol OR 24‑hr urine cortisol)
High ACTH → pituitary vs ectopic: high‑dose dexamethasone; consider IPSS
Suspect adrenal insufficiency → 8am cortisol ± ACTH stimulation test

cases.stem: A 28‑year‑old with hyperpigmented palmar creases, weight loss, and salt craving after a GI illness.
cases.teaching: Loss of cortisol removes negative feedback → ↑ACTH and ↑MSH → hyperpigmentation.

cases.stem: A 62‑year‑old smoker with muscle weakness, edema, and refractory hypokalemia.
cases.teaching: Paraneoplastic ACTH production lacks feedback responsiveness.
